name: Profit and Loss in Uniswap V3
content: Understanding factors affecting profit and loss for liquidity providers in Uniswap V3

steps.name: Fees Earned
steps.content: As an LP in Uniswap V3, you earn fees on trades within your set price range. Fees are proportional to the amount of liquidity you provide within the active price range.

steps.name: Changes in Asset Values
steps.content: The value of the assets you've provided as liquidity and changes due to price movements impact your PnL. This includes the concept of impermanent loss.

steps.name: Gas Costs
steps.content: In Uniswap V3, due to its capital efficiency feature, LPs might adjust their positions more frequently, incurring Ethereum network transaction (gas) fees.

steps.name: Complexity of PnL Calculation
steps.content: Calculating PnL in Uniswap V3 is complex due to factors like specific price range, liquidity depth, and active or passive liquidity management.
